text: Brod () is a rural locality (a village) in Asovskoye Rural Settlement, Beryozovsky District, Perm Krai, Russia. The population was 107 as of 2010. There are 4 streets. == Geography == It is located 5.5 km north-west from Asovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Beryozovsky District, Perm Krai
title: Brod, Beryozovsky District, Perm Krai
